body.name: GANA Wii to HDMI Converter Adapter with Hdmi Cable Connect Wii Console to HDMI Display in 1080p Output Video with 3.5mm Audio Supports All Wii Display Modes White
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 14 hrs 9 mins
features: Wii to HDMI Converter: Stable signal transmission, hassle-free setup and supports 720p/1080p HDCP compliant no transmission loss audio video synchronization strong compatibility plug and play

Steady signal：Wii to HDMI Converter with seamless signal stability and simplified setup. Say goodbye to tangled cords and enjoy the convenience of a single cable connection. It is HDCP compliant, guaranteeing compatibility with HDMI devices

HD video and audio：High-definition visuals with no transmission loss, delivering exceptional image quality on your large screen. Achieve audio-video synchronization as the standard Wii output is converted to an HDMI 1.3 compatible device. Connect your PC speakers or headset directly for an enhanced audio experience

Simply plug and play: Using the Wii to HDMI Converter is effortless. With no settings or driver installations required. Connect the converter to your Wii console, then plug the HDMI cable directly into your monitor or display

Wide compatibility： Enjoy wide compatibility with support for the Wii game console input. Whether you're gaming at home or exploring various game sites, this converter ensures optimal performance. It supports all Wii display modes, including NTSC 480i, 480p, and PAL 576i

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: GANA Wii Adapter to Hdmi How can we assist you? We can help you make your Wii console compatible with HDMI monitors and TVs, ensuring high-definition picture quality, and simplifying the connection process. Our aim is to provide you with an enhanced gaming and viewing experience.

GANA Wii Adapter to Hdmi How can we assist you? We can help you make your Wii console compatible with HDMI monitors and TVs, ensuring high-definition picture quality, and simplifying the connection process. Our aim is to provide you with an enhanced gaming and viewing experience.

Please Note: NOT SUPPORT for wii mini The Wii to HDMI Converter is not an upscaler. The MAXIMUM native resolution of Wii is analog out 480i or 480p depending on the cable you use, which means the converter will NOT magically turn your games into 720p or 1080p. Instead the converter will use the component analog 480p video signal and turn it into digital information to be send through the HDMI cable so as to help Will be functioned in 720/1080p device with better viewing.

GANA Wii Hdmi Adapter Specifications: Supported Video input Mode: Includes all the display modes of the Wii console (NTSC 480i 480p, PAL 576i) Supported HDMI output Mode: Outputs pure digital HDMI video/audio signals Input Connector: Wii AV Multi Out Plug Output Connectors: HDMI Connector & 3.5mm Stereo Audio Jack Plug and Play: Using the Wii to HDMI Converter is effortless With no settings or driver installations required Best Game Partner: The additional 3.5 mm audio jack makes you connect speakers or soundbar to enjoy the game better The adapter does not cover other sockets and works well on your device Enjoy your game life right now!

Note: When you install the device and start it, due to the incompatibility of the device to some terminals, please tell us promptly if the following problems arise. 1.No picture display, no sound 2.Have picture but no sound 3.Have sound but no picture display 4.If you receive an defective one (like wavy or red lines) or you have any problems with this wii to hdmi adapter, please get back to us for replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great picture through HDMI
reviews.reviewText: This adapter works exceptionally well. I have a 75 inch Sony Bravia TV and this adapter uses the entire screen without me having to make any adjustments. The wii game sounds also come out of my speakers without any extra cords or configuration. This is has plug and play as it gets. And the picture is clear and bright. This is the one to get.

reviews.reviewText: Easy install and no need for separate audio Jack, audio works fine via hdmi

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised. Easy plug and play setup.
reviews.reviewText: The product is compact and works as advertised to adapt the standard Wii output port to an HDMI port. The picture quality is no less than when using the Nintendo supplied component output cable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024

reviews.reviewText: A very good purchase...its feature to convert the wii to HDMI was a great asset.Its easy to install and it brings its own HDMI cable.My Wii worked as before.Very pleased with item.It arrived as expected.

reviews.reviewText: I am so happy with this adaptor. I hadn’t hooked up my Wii in years because of having a smart tv. This adaptor has been great. Good price and easy to hook up.

Works well came with the cord as well as the adaptor quick and easy set up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Got this to connect to new smart tv, works very well, no issues.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to use and great quality.
reviews.reviewText: I have yet to upgrade from my Wii to the WiiU or the switch, but I still want my kids to be able to play the Wii when they are old enough. With my big screen TV, we aren't able to connect the Wii to it as the TV doesn't have the proper inputs. I saw this online and decided to give it a try.The packaging for this product is simple but convenient. There is no unnecessary packaging and the box comes with the Wii to HDMI adapter and the instruction manual.The use of this product is extremely simple as it is just a plug and play. It comes with a port for the HDMI to plug in to, but also includes an audio port if you want to have the audio sent to external speakers. The quality of the image and sound are great and don't seem to have any issues.Overall Impression: I really wanted to be able to use my Wii on our big screen TV, but because of how new it is, we weren't able to connect it. With this product, we were able to connect the Wii to our new TV and it works great. I am sure my kids will be able to enjoy the Wii now that they can play it on our TV. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewTitle: Good product very easy to setup and works perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Good product very easy to setup and works perfectly . Thank you
